physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Somnolent, dry mouth, slurring words. Sclera icteric. Dry mucous membranes. Mild abdominal distension and tenderness to palpation over the left lower quadrant, no rebound or guarding. Warm extremities, well perfused, 2+ pitting edema to distal thigh. Alert and oriented to person, place, and time, but unable to recall the president.
